P

Pair - Class in shef.mt.util
A simple class that models a pair of String
It provides equality operators based on keys and values

parseArguments(String[]) - Method in class shef.mt.AbstractFeatureExtractor
The implementations of this abstract method should handle the command line arguments and retrieve parameters required by the application Since the command line arguments are application specific, this method doesn't have a default implementation

POSProcessor - Class in shef.mt.tools
The POSProcessor class analyses a file produced by a pos tagger and sets certain values to a Sentence object These values are, currently, the number of nouns, verbs, pronouns and content words
POSProcessor(String) - Constructor for class shef.mt.tools.POSProcessor
initialise a POSProcessor from an input file The POSProcessor expect an input file in a fixed format, where each line is of the type:
word DT word (tokens separated by tab)

processSentence(Sentence) - Method in class shef.mt.tools.POSProcessor
Reads the pos tags associated to a sentence and counts the number of content words The count for each type of content word is addedd as a value to the sentence
